DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluation metabolic effect honey , supplemental food , patient suffer type 1 diabetes mellitus . A crossover design ( two 12-weeks intervention period ) use measure honey effect . The subject randomize two group ( intervention control [ I/C ] control intervention [ C/I ] group . Each group consist 10 patient . . The subject I/C group consume 0.5 ml honey/kg/day first 12-week period ( period 1 ) subject C/I group receive honey control period 1 . After period 1 subject group exchange protocol follow 12-week period ( period 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Effects Honey Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: All patient type 1 diabetes mellitus last HbA1C less 10 % candidate study . Coexisting renal hepatic impairment Coexisting diseases e.g. , malignancy , endocrine disorder Patients steroid therapy drug may affect body weight serum lipid .
